title: Magical Girls = Cute = ??
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Haah~...., Today’s bread is also delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>It really is, Kasumi-san’s bread rolls are truly great huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>That’s so true~ I want her to make me one everyday~. That or maybe she could teach me her bread making ways!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>….I’ve asked about that before, but she evaded the topic right away. I’m sure there must be a big secret to it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm…. You can’t get it out of her huh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Maybe it’s something that she can’t say to other people…. That’s right, maybe she uses magic…. I’ve seen something like that recently on the book Hanamaru-san lent me, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eh-!? Kasumi-chan is a magician!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You catch on quick, Honoka-san. When you think of magicians, don’t cute magical girls come into mind? Magical Girls = Cute, Kasumi-san = Cute…. In short, doesn’t that mean Kasumi-san = Magical Girl?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeh--!? T- then let’s go to her place right away! I want to know a way to get perfect scores without studying with magic!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You can’t do that! You have to do that on your own!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
